attributes.action: Make fox hunting illegal in every possible way.
attributes.additional_details:
Complete ban Fox hunting in every way.
Not just with dogs.
Foxes should never be killed for fun, fur or meat; and definitely not caged or trapped(snare).
In addition to, stop hunting for fun and only if its a dire need for FOOD
Foxes are barely edible don't hunt Foxes in general.
attributes.background:
We have an over population of rabbits, foxes keep them at an average rate. Also they are beautiful creatures that are barely edible, which means if there are hunted, they are hunted for fun.
That infuriates me to an astronomical way.
